name: UIMenuElement.State
desc: Constants that indicate the state of an action- or command-based menu element.

items.name: case off
items.desc: A constant indicating the menu element is in the “off” state.

items.name: case on
items.desc: A constant indicating the menu element is in the “on” state.

items.name: case mixed
items.desc: A constant indicating the menu element is in the “mixed” state.
